At a glance, the Quality focus uses the Product Quality Assurance Plan and other tools and systems to:

  • Develop or identify robust test methods

  • Develop product specifications to define critical performance characteristics based on known variability

  • Use statistics and experimental design to identify product specifications and other data

  • Confirm manufacturing capability of a product

  • Determine final product specifications and support Launch and post-Launch activities

By completing and documenting the process across phases, the Quality focus also contributes to Product and Process Understanding (PPU): a method of understanding the relationships between customer wants and 3M production that can inform future projects and guide internal improvements at 3M.
